description.value: An AU PS Consumer is a system that consumes an AU PS Bundle and uses it to display or process patient summary content. This actor is based on the Consumer (IPS) actor, and describes the additional requirements and documentation applied for the Australian context.

documentation.value:
An AU PS Consumer **SHALL** comply with the requirements of the [IPS Consumer](https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-ips/ActorDefinition-Consumer.html), and:
- **SHALL** implement the AU PS Bundle, AU PS Composition and AU PS Patient profiles
- **SHALL** for each mandatory section in AU PS Composition, implement the AU PS profiles referenced by the section entry (i.e. AU PS AllergyIntolerance, AU PS Condition, AU PS MedicationStatement and AU PS MedicationRequest)
- **SHOULD** for each recommended section in AU PS Composition, implement the profiles referenced by the section entry (e.g. AU PS Immunization, Observation Results - Radiology (IPS), AU PS Procedure, and DeviceUseStatement (IPS))
- **SHALL** implement the AU PS Consumer obligations in the implemented profiles. Where an IPS profile is referenced in the AU PS Bundle the obligations of the Consumer (IPS) actor SHALL apply
- **SHALL** implement the requirements on Suppressed Data when an element is NOT allowed to be shared
- **SHALL** consume resources containing *Must Support* elements with Missing Data, Empty Sections, or Suppressed Data without error
